derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin millenarius (see millenary) + -an

means.word_mean: 1. a person who believes in the coming of the millennium (a time of great peace and prosperity)
1. relating to or believing in the millennium of peace and happiness

auth_sentence.content: I even harbored the millenarian suspicion that with our generation history might have come to an end.
